name: Bite through the Night
description:
Bite through the Night is a simple card game.

A fixed deck, with upgrades, your mission is to bite enough others to complete the level before the sun comes back up.

Controls are completly by mouse, so could also be played on mobile.

This is my 3rd (finished) commision to a game-jam, a longer 16 day one.

So i took this chance to try a 3D game, learning that a 3D human model with rigging and animation takes a lot of time, and was well worth the experience.

I hope you enjoy it, feel free to leave a comment.
